basic.description:
{Basic Scholar}

Increases earned experiences by 5% + 5% per level. 20% chance to learn any spell up to 2nd level used in combat

advanced.description:
{Advanced Scholar}

Increases earned experiences by 10% + 5% per level. 40% chance to learn any spell up to 3rd level used in combat

expert.description:
{Expert Scholar}

Increases earned experiences by 15% + 5% per level. 60% chance to learn any spell up to 4th level used in combat
